comments:

David, are you still getting this?

Thanks for asking. This originally came from a user of our product (based on Eclipse). The user had the automatic updates turned off, so Ill ask them to re-enable to see if the problem still reproduces. 

FYI, our product is currently based on 3.1.0. We are moving to 3.2 once its released.
